abstract: When your favorite musician comes to your town, an ad based on your Facebook profile is a great thing. But how often does that happen?
snippet: When your favorite musician comes to your town, an ad based on your Facebook profile is a great thing. But how often does that happen?
lead_paragraph: The benefit to consumers of ad targeting is generally overstated. You already know about most things businesses want to sell you, so even though you are a dog owner, it doesn’t really make your life that much better to see ads for Alpo instead of Friskies.

headline.main: The Sweet Sound of a Well-Targeted Ad
